entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Highvale
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tomahawk 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -22.4°C
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -26.2°C
Wind: E 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning and late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
